name: Pantry Panic (UF Digital Worlds Institute)
description:
In Pantry Panic, you've been kidnapped by a hungry monster with a sophisticated palate! Feed this monster your 5-star recipes and explore the spooky basement to find more ingredients before you lose courage.

If you are lucky, you may discover a way to poison your monster host and free yourself from this pantry prison.

With a variety of mini-games, plenty of recipes and ingredients, and an insatiable host you'll need to do battle to a variety of dangerous food creatures down in the basement to keep your pantry well-stocked.

Pantry Panic WebGL Playable Version

https://mckoleman.itch.io/pantry-panic

Pantry Panic Behance page
